lines.text: Overture, I don't know what's the matter. I can't do anything with my hair. Everytime I comb it down, it stands up again.
Dat's all right. Keep it down. It'll get tired of standin' up.
You know there's something about you that's different. When you tell a fella something, he can believe it.
Oh, I don't know. Maybe it's because you haven't been in hot water as long as the rest of them, and so you're not hardboiled.
